design_philosophy.mood_board: White sands, emerald waters, sun-bleached wood, crisp linens, warm hospitality.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-medium shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300 transform hover:-translate-y-1
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-primary border-2 border-primary hover:bg-primary/5 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-medium transition-all duration-300

cards.room_card: group bg-white rounded-2xl overflow-hidden shadow-md hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-500 border border-border/50
cards.feature_card: bg-secondary/50 p-8 rounded-xl hover:bg-white hover:shadow-lg transition-all duration-300 border border-transparent hover:border-border

inputs.default: rounded-lg border-border focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 focus:border-primary bg-white h-12

hero.alt: Aerial view of Destin Florida Emerald Coast

instructions_to_main_agent: Install 'react-day-picker' for the calendar component (if using shadcn/ui calendar).
Ensure the booking flow is a multi-step process: Availability -> Guest Details -> Payment -> Confirmation.
Use the provided image URLs for specific sections. Do NOT use placeholders.
Implement a 'Sticky Booking Bar' on the bottom of mobile screens or top of desktop screens.
Create a 'Gallery' component with a simple lightbox modal.
The 'Contact' page must include a Google Maps embed (iframe).
For the 'RoomCard' component, ensure the price is prominent and per night.
Use the 'Manrope' font for body text to ensure high readability.
Use 'Playfair Display' for all Headings (H1-H4) to give the hotel feel.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry where appropriate.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters for overlays.
